title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Synchronous Virtual Coaching for Online Non-Traditional Doctoral Program Support

context.prior_knowledge: Scholarly writing skills and understanding of basic research methodologies
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can effectively participate in academic paper structure design and peer review processes within 6 months
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in developing research topics based on expert feedback through synchronous meetings

Learners will complete three project-based assignments over six months, submit a portfolio documenting weekly learning plans and progress, and receive a self-directedness evaluation score of 4+ (on a 5-point scale) from an advisor.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
